item.description:
As the holiday season is coming upon us, let us take some time to dwell in our gratitude for all the goodness in our lives, and share our abundance through food we prepare with love.

In addition to our Raw Maine Thanksgiving feast, we will have a showing of the film Simply Raw: Reversing Diabetes in 30 Days. Come see this incredible film which follows 6 people with diabetes, on their journey to health through a raw vegan diet.

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be! Big Gratitude: Thanks to be Giving
